io.confluent.ksql.query

Interface BlockingRowQueue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PullQueryQueue, TransientQueryQueue

    public interface BlockingRowQueue
    The queue between the Kafka-streams topology and the client connection.

    The KS topology writes to the queue from its StreamThread, while the KSQL server thread that is servicing the client request reads from the queue and writes to the client socket.
